entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening and ending after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
